about_the_game:
Aquelarre is an historical immersive episodic Visual Novel. A narrative-driven game with RPG and Point And Click elements that transports you to a Medieval Spain in which beliefs and superstitions are true. Your decisions will make the legends come to life, influencing the story and developing your character.

✓ Your decisions change history
Choose between different options throughout the adventure, discover all the possible endings and live how your decisions affect your characters.
✓ Build your character
Your choices don't just affect the story. Choose how your character will develop, gaining skills that will facilitate your passage through the world of Aquelarre.
✓ Find out if the legends are true
Enter a disturbing time in which the line that divides reality and myth barely exists. Be part of the legends, reveal the most hidden mysteries and meet all the characters who will guide you (or not) during the adventure.
✓ Immerse yourself in their universe by being an active part of it.
Enjoy the complete plot that will captivate you for hours, accompanied by the inspiring art and the immersive soundtrack. Transport yourself to the universe of Aquelarre completely with a graphic and sound aspect that conveys the message of the game.

This game contains adult content, including violence, nudity, and mature themes. Player discretion is advised.
